name: ~THE GREAT GATSBY~
description:
The game runs in your browser on any laptop or desktop! Made using Construct 3, The Great Gatsby is a faithful adaptation of the second chapter of F. Scott Fitzgerald's famous novel recreated as a 2d Platformer/Visual Novel!

Arrow keys to move.

Play in full-screen to avoid some issues.

This game has the resolution of the GameBoy, but one more color.

CONTENT WARNING: CONTAINS SCENES OF DOMESTIC ABUSE AND LANGUAGE

I made everything in the game except for the palette which is from https://lospec.com/palette-list/ru5ty and the music, which is all public domain.

Soundtrack:

Gymnopédie No.1

The Can Can

~Made for the Gatsby Jam and Ms. Tidey's English Class~
